Plot: Mankind is dying. Only one man can do anything about it, Space Captain Harlock, but the Gaia Coalition will stop at nothing to end him.
Title: Harlock: Space Pirate
Writer: Leiji Matsumoto (manga), Harutoshi Fukui (screenplay), Kiyoto Takeuchi (screenplay)
Actors: Yû Aoi, Jessica Boone, Ayano Fukuda, Arata Furuta
